title: Imam Anwar al-Alwiki Lectures on Islam
description:
I had to reseed this because the other location was messed up.

Imam Anwar al-Alwiki Lectures on Islam

Imam Anwar al Alwiki was blown up into tiny little pieces by a CIA drone because he was 
a Muslim jihad murdering maniac who was preaching "holy war" against European and 
American people. (Hooray for the CIA!) But in every way, he was an ordinary, everyday 
Muslim who smiles in your face while planning your murder. As a Muslim preacher and Imam, 
he traveled around teaching Muslims why they should be good Muslims and kill everybody 
they meet and steal everything they can get their hands on and rape all the women. He recorded 
his lectures in English for English-speaking Muslims so that they can go crazy in the 
English-speaking world, too, like all good Muslim should. Imam Alwiki taught Muslims 
how to be good Muslims. But the CIA proved that there is a wonderful way of making good 
Muslims even better.

Fortunately, for the free people of the world, this murdering Muslim pig left a series of English 
language lectures telling the world just how bizarre, demented and evil Islam really is. As a 
Muslim cleric, Alwiki had delved into the fables and lies of Muslim literature to tell us all how 
wonderful Muslim lies really are. But his delusion about what Islam really is, does not prevent 
the un-biased listener from understanding that this really is the case -- all Muslims are servants
of devils. 

Christians, Hindus, Buddhists and all religious people should listen to the inside
information about Islam that Alwiki teaches. As Mohammad taught "War is deceit." So, in
the perpetual Jihad ("Holy War") that Islam is waging against the entire world, when a Muslim
tells you that "Islam is the religion of peace", in fact, he is lying and trying to deceive you.

Islam is a demonic religion of lies, murder, thievery and slavery. It makes big promises about 
what a Muslim will get in Paradise -- mansions of gold, green gardens full of delicious fruit each 
as big as a house, 72 virgins to screw for eternity, etc. But in exchange for these incredible 
promises, the Muslim must murder the people of the world, steal everything he can get his 
hands on, rape the women of the world, enslave the people of the world, and burn down 
everything. That's what makes a good Muslim and that's how a Muslim proves to his demon 
god Allah that he is worthy to enter paradise just like the voices in Mohammad's head promised.

These lectures were not given all sugar-coated to a non-Muslim audience so as to deceive them 
into accepting Islam. These lectures were given to English-speaking Muslim audiences in London 
and Los Angeles, teaching them the history of Islam and the finer points of killing people and 
subverting nations through perpetual Jihad. Once you listen to these lectures, you will know 
everything and every secret about Islam. They were not meant for the non-Muslim; they were 
meant for the average thieving and murdering Muslim, just like the ones living near to you 
right now.

These lectures are many hours and so are divided into 12 parts: 

1.The Life of Mohammad Part 1 (16 Lectures)
2.The Life of Mohammad Part 2 (18 Lectures)
3.Abu Bakr (15 Lectures)
4.Companions Of The Ditch (6 Lectures)
5.Lives of the Prophets (64 Lectures)
6.Umar Ibn al-Khattab (18 Lectures)
7.Stories from Hadeeths (4 Lectures)
8.Jihad (11 Lectures)
9.The Constants of Jihad (6 Lectures)
10.The Hereafter Part 1 (9 Lectures)
11.The Hereafter Part 2 (12 Lectures)
12.Allah is Preparing Us for Victory (2 Lectures)

After listening to these lectures, you will understand that (1) Europe, the USA, Australia and 
all countries of European descent are under assault and (2) what we have been told by the 
Jews in the Media about Islam is nothing but lies. The Jews claim to fight against Islam today, 
but historically the Jews have always been allies of the Muslims because both are opposed to 
Christianity and both believe that they cannot win world domination unless Christianity and 
European, Western Civilization is destroyed. Both strive for genocide of the white, Western 
peoples.

As you will come to understand by listening to these lectures, the only difference between a 
moderate Muslim and a fanatical Muslim is that the fanatical Muslim wants to kill you today 
while the moderate Muslim is patiently waiting until tomorrow to kill you.

Learn the facts about Islam straight from the camel's mouth. Alwiki was a deluded maniac 
just as all Muslims are deluded by the lies of Mohammad (mhrh).
